Test Name: CLOVE (Clostridium difficile Toxin), Immunoglobulin E (IGE), and Serum analyte tests
Specimen Type: Fresh stool (for CLOVE) and serum (for IGE and other serum analytes)
Purpose: To accurately detect C. difficile toxin, quantify Immunoglobulin E levels, and measure assorted serum analytes for clinical diagnosis and management.
Container: Sterile stool container (CLOVE); serum separator tube (SST) or red-topped tube (IGE and serum tests)
Equipment: Centrifuge, microplate reader, incubator, ELISA/chemiluminescent assay instruments, and associated reagent kits
